thread.title: Sunbathing with cows, ziplining along the coast and visiting a dragon's lair: Infographic reveals the most unusual beach activities across the world
thread.title_full: Sunbathing with cows, ziplining along the coast and visiting a dragon's lair: Infographic reveals the most unusual beach activities across the world | Daily Mail Online

author: Katie Amey for MailOnline
title: Sunbathing with cows, ziplining along the coast and visiting a dragon's lair: Infographic reveals the most unusual beach activities across the world
text:
34 shares 3
View
comments
No summer is complete without a trip to the beach.
But why spend it simply laying on a sun-lounger? At some of the world's most beautiful sandy shores, there are plenty of unorthodox activities on offer.
For those eager to get out on a boat, look no further than Halong Bay in Vietnam.
In Vietnam, the picturesque Halong Bay is home over 2,000 islands, as well as a traditional floating village
A look at the stunning islands Halong Bay in Vietnam The picturesque cove is home to over 2,000 islands, as well as a traditional floating village - perfect for picking up some fresh seafood or a hand-crafted souvenir.
 Next Perfect for a drink this summerâ€¦ provided the rain holds... Book the last flight of the day and NEVER enter the security... Taking the plunge: The spellbinding photographs that show... Jail break: Former Great Scotland Yard HQ set to be... 34 shares In Australia, Emerald Beach in New South Wales offers animal-lovers the opportunity to spot a wild beach kangaroo in its natural habitat: the lush, green hills that surround the cove.
And at Mosquito Bay in Puerto Rico, the shores literally sparkle.
Travel Republic also listed kangaroo spotting at Emerald Beach in Australia among its best beach activities
Thanks to an excess of mangrove trees, which release vitamin B12, this beach is one of the few places in the world where you can see bioluminescent sand.
For dozens more innovative ideas for enjoying the ocean all year round, simply look to this handy infographic - or the full list of ideas - compiled by Travel Republic .
Read more: 57 Unusual Beach Activities Around the World from Travel Republic
